sourcesContent:
import styles from './Profile.module.css' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; const defaultImg = "https://media.istockphoto.com/vectors/smile-vector-template-design-vector-id988112594?k=6&m=988112594&s=170667a&w=0&h=zy2D23dg7Hfz-A5pvz2BMiHi6Og2ed-DCldz367yvf0="; const Profile = ({ user }) => { const { avatar = defaultImg, name = "Вася Тряпочкин", tag, location, stats } = user; return (

{name}

@{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {stats.followers}
  • Views {stats.views}
  • Likes {stats.likes}
) } Profile.propTypes = { avatar: PropTypes.string, name: PropTypes.string, tag: PropTypes.string, location: PropTypes.string, followers: PropTypes.string, views: PropTypes.number, likes: PropTypes.number, }; export default Profile;
